name: Scrap Attack
description:
Controls

 W&D to move forwards and backwards
 A&D to turn left and right
 Spacebar to pick up and deposit scrap

You are Scrapy the robot. Your creators have started you up but neglected to give you a power cell now starting with no battery your quickly draining your internal charge you must quickly scrap the metal parts that get dumped into your room and try to stay powered as long as possible.

If you wish to view my source code you can find it here:  https://github.com/TheseusInABottle/LD45_ScrapAttack
